characters: Driver of a white sedan, pedestrians
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with moderate traffic. A white sedan is ahead, and pedestrians are crossing the road from the right side. The pedestrians are moving towards the left side of the road, creating a potential hazard for the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while monitoring the pedestrians crossing from the right side. The vehicle is prepared to decelerate if the pedestrians move into its path.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Right side: Two pedestrians, approximately 2 meters away, crossing the road towards the left side.
